verbs.description: [ARG0: I] [V: thought] [ARG1: it ironic that right next to George Will ’s scathing comments on May 11 about Vice President Pence and his relationship to President Trump is an editorial viewpoint praising then - Lieutenant Governor Colyer about his loyalty to Governor Brownback] .
